author: Ben Travis
title: First Dates couple realise they dated 20 years ago in heart-warming Valentine’s Day special | London Evening Standard
text:
First Dates couple realise they dated 20 years ago in heart-warming Valentine’s Day special 
Vince and Anna realised they weren’t actually on a first date after all Tuesday 14 February 2017 12:17 GMT Click to follow West Ham's Antonio shows off dance moves in Valentine's Day advert 
The central hook of Channel 4 ’s First Dates is in the name – hopeful singletons head to a London restaurant to go on a first date with a total stranger. 
Except, in the show’s latest Valentine’s special, one couple realised that they knew each other from years and years ago – and had even once dated. 
Vincent and Anna hit it off well, and small talk soon revealed that they both grew up in the same area. 
“You know I said you look really familiar, you really do and it’s… I’m sure you know my cousin,” an intrigued Anna said. (Channel 4) 
Of course, it quickly became clear that Vincent did indeed know Anna’s cousin – and the penny soon dropped. Top Gear fans say show is 'dead' after first glimpse at new line-up 
“I think you know me too,” Anna continued. “From years ago.” 
It turned out that the pair went to the same school, and had had a previous romantic encounter. 
“We went on a date!” a shocked Vincent realised. 
Anna confirmed: “I know, that’s what I thought when I walked in! The biggest and best TV shows of 2017 The biggest and best TV shows of 2017 1/7 The Moorside
